Description: Lifting Supervisor (3 months temporary)• Preparation of Lifting plan and follow-up of Risk assessment, lifting method etc.• Supervise lifting activities.• Supervising offloading, loading & shifting activities.• Maintain logistics procedure rules.• Follow up safe stocking procedure.• Ensure compliance with health and safety legislation.• Coordinate with other departments whenever needed.• Take reasonable care for their private health and safetySkills
